pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Specificity at Controlled Sensitivity, or Vice Versa // Perform biomarker evaluation and comparison in terms of specificity at a controlled sensitivity level, or sensitivity at a controlled specificity level. Point estimation and exact bootstrap of Huang, Parakati, Patil, and Sanda (2023) doi:10.5705/ss.202021.0020 for the one- and two-sample problems are implemented.
